item.title: Vans and Cars Consistently Parked, 15th November
item.description:
Image speaks for itself- happens daily especially after 18:30. Normally have about 4 vans or cars parked. This van in particular is there daily. Along the cycle path - unsafe for cyclists and pedestrians. FINE THESE PEOPLE

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hertford Road, London Borough of Enfield
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipping report and request for warning sign, 15th November
item.description:
I am writing to report fly-tipping in my area. Please see the attached photo, which shows a dumped mattress and other rubbish left by the roadside next to the metal fence. This location is starting to attract repeated fly-tipping and is making the area look neglected. I would be very grateful if you could arrange for the waste to be removed and consider installing a fly-tipping warning sign at this spot. I have an Amazon Ring camera which I will be installing at my home overlooking this area, and I would be happy to provide any footage or information that may help you identify offenders, if needed. Thank you very much for your help.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Milton Road, Lessness Heath, Erith, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tesco car park and street in front of Tesco litterong, 15th November
item.description:
There is constantly litter at this location. There may not be enough bins or they may be collected too infrequently. I don’t know if it is the responsibility of Tesco or majestic wine or the council but thought I would start with the council and if not bring it to the attention of the corporations. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2a, Stone Park Avenue, Beckenham, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
